articles.description: England are in danger of seeing their early work in the World Cup undone, even if they progress through to the knockouts
articles.content: After England's 6-2 thrashing of Iran in their opening game of the World Cup, many seemed to jump to the conclusion that the group was all sorted. However, that's far from the case as a 0-0 draw to U… [+2620 chars]
